newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: ST Electronic in Singapore train project.
newsitem.headline: ST Electronic in Singapore train project.

text.p: St Electronic & Engineering Ltd said on Monday it was part of a consortium awarded a Singapore $130 million contract for infrastructure for a new mass rapid transit line in Singapore.
It said in a statement Singapore's Land Transportation Authority awarded the contract to the consortium, which includes GEC Alsthom Transportation SA, on July 26.
The contract consists of signalling equipment for stations, tunnels and trains and for station platform screen doors for the North East line.
Work on the project has begun and the system is expected to be commissioned by September 2002.
